body.name: Linenspa 5 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Firm Mattress, Low Profile Bed Twin 5 Inch Mattress
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 17 hrs 41 mins
features: General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your mattress to regain its full shape. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room. The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding.
CONTOURING COMFORT: 4 inches of high-density base foam are topped with an inch of comfortable, gel-infused memory foam for a supportive, firm mattress that’s great for stomach or back sleepers

VERSATILE SIZE: The 5 inch profile is compact and perfect for a bunk bed, day bed, trundle mattress, RV mattress, or other low profile bed option. Great for kids, teens, or guest rooms.Top:Breathable Cover
CHOOSE YOUR FRAME: This Linenspa 5 inch mattress is designed to be used with any bed frame including a metal grid, platform, slat, or traditional box spring bed base
EASY SETUP: This gel memory foam mattress is rolled, compressed, and boxed for convenient delivery and setup. Simply remove the packaging and allow the mattress to decompress for 48-72 hours
REST ASSURED: No more tossing and turning! Sleep easy knowing we’ve got you covered. Your Linenspa gel memory foam mattress is backed by a 10-year warranty that guards against manufacturer defects
body.description: Upgrade from a basic mattress with the Linenspa 5 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress. The top layer features 1 inch of gel infused memory foam that conforms to your body and hugs you to sleep. Beneath this comfort layer, a 4 inch layer of high density form offers incredible support for a firm mattress that’s also comfortable for stomach and back sleepers. The soft, breathable fabric cover adds an extra layer of comfort to this low profile mattress. This 5 inch mattress is the perfect pairing for a low profile bed, making it great for bunk beds, trundle beds, day beds, RVs, or kids’ rooms. Arrives compressed for easy shipping. Allow 48-72 hours to decompress after unpackaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh em gee!!!
reviews.reviewText: Ok. So I'm one of those people that absolutely suck at buying big purchases like new mattresses when they're clearly needed. I tend to just sleep on the old original, make due, suffer, and complain about it every waking hour..I want to first admit. I did get a discount on this one. Not sure how, just put it in my cart and it was cheaper than what the list price was. Might have been a credit from Amazon I wasn't aware of at the time..So I bought it anyways.First the packaging is awesome. Came in a really small box vacuum sealed with 2 layers of plastic.Remove from box, remove first plastic. 'roll it out', remove second plastic, and watch it expand right before your eyes..It DOES take about 24hrs for it to fully expand. Do not be discouraged. The middle portion expands fast, but the ends (head and foot) do take a little extra time but it's not a big deal honestly.. Give it time!First I sat on it, and it was amazing! Firm, but plush against me, supported but didn't push back so much I was uncomfortable. Then I laid on it. Super firm for the first couple seconds, but once your body sinks into it it really does add great support, but cradles at the same time..It's firm for support, but plush enough to still cradle you like a softy.. Best of both worlds.First sleep.. Now. I've had chronic sleep problems, and severe pain for years, and I really believe it was due to bad sleep on an older spring mattress that's seen better days.. I'd toss, turn, wake up over and over. and though I was laying down for 8-10hrs. I was probably only actually asleep for 2 of those nightly. Life sucked! (although I'm sure the chiropractor enjoyed all the visits)First sleep on this mattress. I slept through the night, turned over once and woke up fine. Sat up. did my morning twist and turn, snappity, crackity, pop. stretched out and actually felt muscles stretching and not just bone/joints grinding.. After about a week. (because there's no miracle pill) I lost 90% of my chronic pain. Because I'm sleeping through the night, not tossing and turning constantly, and the mattress is supporting me no matter my angle.I would 100% recommend this, and other products by this company.. It's cheap! (I mean inexpensive), well worth the money, it comes in different firmness's, and trust me. Your body will love you..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed
reviews.reviewText: We needed a quick set up and take down, (and also portable) twin bed for a college age guest that occasionally stays with us. We needed something better than an air mattress and something we could hide away. This worked out to be the perfect floor bed. We added a 2 inch memory foam mattress topper on top of it along with a fitted sheet. It’s pretty comfortable in this configuration - firm enough to lounge on and read, but also cushiony and supportive enough to sleep on for the week our guest spent with us during a winter storm. Our guest reported it was so comfortable, they would like to order a similar one for their first apartment. This mattress immediately came to life and expanded to full size right out of the box. There was no smell. We began using it 24 hours later. It is light enough than I can move it from room to room. Great solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just what was needed!
reviews.reviewText: My son constantly asked to sleep on the couch. We bought this mattress, replacing his one. He sleeps in his bed every week night with no issue. He says it is comfortable. He actually goes into his room to relax in his bed now.It was delivered on time in a box. I hauled it upstairs alone, but it is on the heavy side. I carefully opened the box and stripped off the plastic covering it was in. After maybe 3 hours the mattress was puffed. I have not measured it. I laid in it and was pleased. It is just what was needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great memory foam mattress!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our son’s bed and it’s a great mattress for a great price. We left it out for about 2 days so it could expand to its full size. It’s nice and firm which is what we wanted for him. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit perfectly in my palomino truck camper
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant rv mattress replacement! Since it’s a memory foam mattress the extra 1” you don’t notice with the height of the camper. Very comfy too.They say “firm” but compared to my zinus mattress at home it’s “semi firm”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MOTHER TESTED AND KID APPROVED (dare also accepted)
reviews.reviewText: (The names have been changes to protect the hilarity, but this review is based on true events and the sentiment is 100% accurate.)A DAY IN THE LIFE of my husband Jude and I these days consists of work, work, and renovating our home. Seems like EIGHT DAYS A WEEK we are burning the midnight oil and A HARD DAYS NIGHT. Things are GETTING BETTER, but most days I just want to scream for HELP! We recently ordered two Linenspa 5-inch gel mattresses to go with a daybed with trundle for the BOYS room BECAUSE all other mattresses we found were so expensive! These ones were an incredible price. I know you CAN'T BUY ME LOVE but I thought if these worked out, I might argue that point. YESTERDAY we received our order (on a Sunday, an entire day before our scheduled delivery date). My husband took the boxes out and started pulling at the plastic. I yelled, HEY JUDE, LET IT BE! OH! DARLING. YOU CAN'T DO THAT. I told him I'LL BE BACK (because I read the very clear and very short instructions that accompanied our "mattress taquito") and went to get scissors. They easily slid through the plastic and the mattress unfolded. My husband was confused (since he didnt read the instructions) and began smooshing the mattress. I said, HONEY DONT. Just WAIT. Within 15 minutes the mattress was almost fully decompressed. The TWO OF US took turns trying it out. The cover was really impressive and soft to touch. The mattress felt great and held my husband and I both with no issue. I cleaned up a bit and went upstairs and an hour later I came back down and my husband is still on this mattress! I said, WHAT YOU'RE DOING is not okay. That's for the boys. He replied, I'M ONLY SLEEPING. I'M SO TIRED. All I could do was tell him GOOD NIGHT. I received NO REPLY.P.S. I LOVE YOU(Very impressed with packaging, performance, and price. I would entirely recommend this product and will actually be coming back to look at their higher end mattresses in the future.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good mattress, but the 5-inch thickness wasn't enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I actually only bought one of these but for some reason there’s two reviews on it but I did buy it for my son and he loves it. He said it’s very comfortable and he gets a great night sleep

I was looking for a firm mattress to help support my back, and this one hits the mark on all areas. Perfect 5 inch height that doesn't sag into the ground when you put weight on it. Provides great support and feels great after long naps.
Lo compré hace un mes para mi hija y ha resultado de excelente calidad, está firme, muy cómodo. Definitivamente lo recomiendo! 👍🏼
Muy bueno, no se deforma ya tenemos mas de un año con el, lo único es que el tamaño individual viene un poquito más pequeño de lo normal pero no es grave, descansas excelente.

Bought this mattress for my toddler's first bed (originally transferred from a crib). I needed a low height mattress because it was for a loft bed and I couldn't be happier! There's enough room from the mattress to the top of the guard rail that I'm not nervous she will lunge herself over the side in the middle of the night. I haven't laid on the mattress for long than a couple hours, but was comfortable even though I don't prefer a firm mattress. My toddler has never had any issues sleeping and continues this same trend on this mattress. Would definitely recommend.

Llegó rápido, en una caja no muy pesada, cómodo pero especialmente lo considero para niños. A la hora de sacarlo del empaque empezó a tomar su forma pero de un lado quedó un hueco, poco a poco se va levantando (una semana). Por el precio es justo.
